channel.title: Adding separate skill classes [DELTA]
channel.description:
I am trying to create separate skill classes for ever skill to clean out the client.java. I am new to coding still but could somebody help me out with one or point me in the right direction. Thanks in advance.
-Sassafras

item.title: Adding separate skill classes [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Sassafras95:

Sooooo. Can someone help me out or point me in a different direction please.

Try using RuneSource or Hyperion.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding separate skill classes [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Pker DX, post:9, topic:545140”][quote author=Limits link=topic=664022.msg4438957#msg4438957 date=1405921730]

I am using the pkplanet delta source. Do you know of one that would be better for a beginner?

Don’t use delta. Use another base like rune-source or hyperion. Unless you want to be all of the other idiots that stay with wL because they think they can make it “better” when it’s just complete shit.

wL is fine if you fix the shit, just takes effort

The reward:effort ratio is far off balance.
[/quote]

That’s debatable.[/quote]

No it’s not. The only thing you would gain out of it is bad programming habits.

Read full topic
